#summary Notes on supported hardware.

Maturity level:
  * High: Users are actively using it.
  * Medium: Support is available in the packaged distribution.
  * Low: Support has been recently implemented and is available only in the subversion trunk.

Auto-Detect:
  * If yes, wfrog will work out-of-the-box without configuration change.
  * If no, you will need to [http://code.google.com/p/wfrog/wiki/CustomizationGuide?ts=1283113562&updated=CustomizationGuide#Specifying_your_station_model configure the appropriate driver], listed in the Driver column.
